briefTitle: Switching to Very Low Nicotine Content Cigarettes vs Reducing Cigarettes Per Day

armGroups.label: Switch to VLNC cigarettes
interventionNames: Other: Very low nicotine content (VLNC) cigarettes and nicotine replacement therapy (NRT)

armGroups.label: Reduce CPD
interventionNames: Other: Reduce cigarettes per day (CPD) with nicotine replacement therapy (NRT)

interventions.name: Very low nicotine content (VLNC) cigarettes and nicotine replacement therapy (NRT)
Reduce cigarettes per day (CPD) with nicotine replacement therapy (NRT)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Eligibility will be determined based on:

* participants' age,
* their cigarettes smoked per day,
* their intention to quit,
* their willingness to use medications,
* prior use of tobacco and non-tobacco nicotine products,
* prior use of stop-smoking services or medications,
* DSM 5 criteria for Tobacco Use Disorder,
* current use of opioid maintenance medications,
* access to a telephone and the Internet,
* proximity to the University of Vermont,
* their bed time,
* status as a US citizen,
* comfort speaking, reading and writing in English, and
* whether or not the participant is breast feeding, pregnant or has the potential to become pregnant or begin breastfeeding during the study period.

outcomeMeasures.title: Feasibility as Indicated by Self-reported Adherence to Study Cigarettes.
outcomeMeasures.description: The investigators will use non-adherence to nicotine reduction (i.e., self report of percent non-study cigarettes per day) as an indicator of feasibility.

outcomeMeasures.title: Self Reported Dependence Using the Nicotine Dependence Syndrome Scale (NDSS)
outcomeMeasures.description: The NDSS is a measure of dependence that does not rely on cigarettes per day as an indicator of dependence.

outcomeMeasures.title: Any Quit Attempt (QA)
outcomeMeasures.description: The percent of participants in each condition who made one or more self-reported quit attempts to stop smoking for good during the study period, lasting any length of time (including attempts lasting less than 24 hours).

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Self Reported Seven Day Point Prevalence Abstinence
outcomeMeasures.description: Self reported seven day point prevalence abstinence.

outcomeMeasures.title: Self-efficacy to Quit Smoking
outcomeMeasures.description: Velicer's self-efficacy scale is a self-report measure of self-efficacy to quit smoking (1=least to 5=most).
